synopsis.text: It follows the amusing and heartwarming tale of two sets of siblings, the Shinmoto twins and the Saitou twins, as they navigate through their daily lives. Chiko, the university-going elder sister of the Shinmoto twins, and her high school-going younger brother, Chika, are known for their narcissistic tendencies. On the other hand, the Saitou twins, consisting of Mako, a part-time caf√© worker, and her high school-going younger brother, Mao, possess an air of mystery. Despite their contrasting personalities, these four individuals share a deep bond of friendship. The anime presents their everyday adventures in school and at home, filled with love, laughter, and the occasional misunderstanding.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
